name: Monster Mail: Island Hopper
description:
So you're a monster! And you want to work?! 

How about join Monster Mail? Deliver all sorts of goods to the inhabitants of different islands.

This little prototype is something I've been working on - and continue to work on it. I'm an aspiring game designer / level designer studying at the S4G School for Games in Berlin, so I'm still learning, so please leave feedback :)

Most assets are from the unity store, some are from itch.io (link 1 & link 2) and some are from another S4G project called Pin - go check it out! Thank you again, Team Peak Production for lending me your 3D assets!

A huuuuge thank you to everyone who helped me with guidance, actions or feedback - thank you all (especially Chris Krebs, thanks a million)
